short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the number of unread tasks in your Inbox folder.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pyrus extension for Chrome:
- Shows the number of unread tasks in your Inbox
- Sends you a push notification when you are assigned a task in Pyrus

Use Pyrus extension for Chrome to always see your inbox tasks in Pyrus.
